list_notification.title: You Successes sign in
list_notification.message: On the other hand it might be a double waste of time. The server-side code has to spend time on formatting dates and the JavaScript code might need to parse the received strings so that they can be used in calculations. Of course, if the serialized data is tiny with only few dates, the performance loss is negligible.
